page.title: 04EDUCATION IN FORD
page.content: There is a primary school in{FORD} which has 46 pupils .The school has suffered a fall in numbers of the past few years, but is now in better circumstances.The children start at 5 years and leave the school at 11 years and most travel by bus to Pontesbury ,to{MARY WEBB COMPREHENSIVE {SCHOOL }.This is the type of schooling supported by the{SHROPSHIRE EDUCATION {AUTHORITY.} Several boys from our school live in our block. We are at a fee-paying private school,{KINGSLAND GRANGE {PREPARATORY SCHOOL}for boys ,in {SHREWSBURY.}We will go onto{SHREWSBURY {SCHOOL,}the local Public school.
